text:
( sighs )
This isn't going to work.

I can't believe
I let them talk me into this.

- Talk you into what?
- Ah, Raine?

How long how you been there?
I-- ( mumbling )

Shouldn't you be practicing
your, um, parade wave?

Ugh, you know
I hate these things.

Talking to people.
Waving to people.

- People.
- ( shuddering )

But I'm just happy
to do my part.

You seem so much more calm
than before.

- ( gasps )
- Oh? Why wouldn't they be?

They were sick for a while,
but thanks to me,
they're good as new.

Terra! And what brings you out
of your greenhouse, Head Witch?
Terra's been helping me recover.

I can't remember anything
with these, ugh, headaches.

Here, sprout.
Drink your tea.
There you go.

Now, you're going to
get on top of that float

and wave to thousands
of chumps all night.

Remember to lead
with your elbow.
I'm on it.

- Terra could ruin everything.
- ( beeping )

You're not trying
to leave are you? Come.

The parade
is about to begin.

- ( cheering )
- ( marching band playing )
( shrieks )
( music continues )
Luz: It's almost time.
Is that our float?
Luz: Not bad, right?
It's a work of art.

- Luz: That was the signal.
- Let's move.
Okay. Uh...
( whimpering )
Uh, I can't get down.
Both: Four, three, two...
Huh?
( crowd gasps )
( growls )

Should we, uh,
do something about that?
Yes, of course, you hangnails.

I command all of you
to investigate.
And scoop!

Aah! I cannot believe we are
being taken against our will!

- What sayeth, you fiend? 
- Luz: Uh, that's right!

I, Hecate,
will whisk you away

to my kingdom of mirrors
and snakes.
Hey, come on.

I didn't know
I had to prepare lines.

Knock it off, you two.
Let's get cracking.
Right. ( holds breath )
( crowd gasps )
Mission success, Hooty.

Now, uh, how do
we get out of here?

We're going to
have to be sneaky.
Hooty: Hi! It's me,
your good buddy Belos.
Worship me!
Kill that monstrosity!

Ha-ha! Not the first time
I've heard that.

- Hoo-hoo-hoo-hoot!
- ( all shouting )

Raine, I'm so glad
you're okay.
Eda, what are you doing here?

I had to make sure you
were okay after that fight

- with Darius and Eber.
- What fight?

It was just a few weeks ago.
I was with you.

Eda, I spent
the last month sick in bed.

And we--
we haven't spoken in years.
( gasps )

Listen, I don't know
what you want with me,
but I'm head of a coven now,

and I can't associate
with wild witches anymore.
So move aside.
No.

I'm not leaving
till I get through to you.

Fine. We can do this
the hard way.
( Hooty laughing )

Oh, my gosh. It's working.
It's actually working.

We're visible? We need
to disappear again.

If we're caught,
she will end us.

- Who will end us?
- ( rumbling )

Kikimora: Head Witch
of the Plant Coven,
Terra Snapdragon.
